original_content:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes, translating them into effective system configurations, and ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support evolving business needs. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to drive efficient and innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear communication of needs.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and devise effective solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in understanding and documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Demonstrated experience in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise-level systems, with a deep understanding of data mapping, integration, and troubleshooting.

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with Java and SQL, which are commonly used in the development and maintenance of enterprise systems.
- Experience in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to drive process optimization and innovation.

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a role that blends business and technical responsibilities, such as a business analyst, systems analyst, or configuration specialist.
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical solutions and configurations.
- Experience in working with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement and support enterprise-level systems.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies and familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for configuration management
- SQL and data visualization tools for data analysis and reporting
- Collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence) for requirement gathering and documentation

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative work environment, with regular interaction with stakeholders from various departments.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team to deliver high-quality, innovative solutions.
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and a willingness to continuously learn and improve processes.
- Commitment to thorough testing and documentation to ensure the long-term sustainability of implemented configurations.

Role Overview:
This role is a critical component of our team, responsible for bridging the gap between business operations and technical implementation. As a highly skilled configuration specialist, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of our business. Your primary focus will be on developing and optimizing new processes within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovative and efficient solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather comprehensive business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and effectively communicate these needs to technical teams.
- Translate complex business requirements into robust and scalable technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations.
- Proactively identify and resolve configuration-related issues, utilizing your strong troubleshooting skills and in-depth understanding of the system's underlying architecture.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data to drive data-informed decisions.
- Spearhead the implementation of ML and AI-powered solutions to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, continuously exploring new technologies and best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, collaborating with cross-functional teams during user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the integrity of the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and enable smooth knowledge transfer.
- Serve as a technical subject matter expert, collaborating with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the successful implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges and devise innovative, data-driven solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows, demonstrating a deep understanding of the business context.
- Proven expertise in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise-level systems, with a strong grasp of data mapping, integration, and troubleshooting methodologies.
- Familiarity with the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to drive process optimization and innovation.

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, which are commonly used in the development and maintenance of enterprise systems.
- Experience in working with Agile methodologies and a demonstrated ability to adapt to changing business requirements.

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a role that combines business and technical responsibilities, such as a business analyst, systems analyst, or configuration specialist.
- Proven track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into robust technical solutions and configurations.
- Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement and support enterprise-level systems.

Preferred Experience:
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, and a strong understanding of the industry's unique challenges and best practices.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for configuration management
- SQL and data visualization tools for data analysis and reporting
- Collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence) for requirement gathering and documentation
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms for process optimization

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative work environment, with regular interaction with stakeholders from various departments.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team to deliver innovative, high-quality solutions.
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and a commitment to continuous learning and process improvement.
- Dedication to thorough testing and comprehensive documentation to ensure the long-term sustainability and scalability of implemented configurations.

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of strategic thinking, technical expertise, and a deep understanding of the vehicle configuration space. As a highly skilled configuration specialist, you will play a pivotal role in driving innovation and efficiency within our systems, ensuring they accurately reflect and support the evolving needs of our business. Your primary focus will be on leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to develop and optimize new processes that deliver tangible value to our organization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather comprehensive business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and effectively communicate these needs to technical teams.
- Translate complex business requirements into robust and scalable technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations.
- Proactively identify and resolve configuration-related issues, utilizing your strong troubleshooting skills, in-depth understanding of the system's underlying architecture, and a solutions-oriented mindset.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging tools for querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data to drive data-informed decisions and process optimization.
- Spearhead the implementation of ML and AI-powered solutions to streamline business processes, enhance system efficiency, and deliver innovative capabilities that provide a competitive advantage.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, collaborating with cross-functional teams during user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the integrity of the solutions.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations, enable knowledge transfer, and facilitate future enhancements.
- Serve as a technical subject matter expert, collaborating with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the successful implementation and continuous improvement of system configurations.
- Actively participate in the evaluation and adoption of new technologies, tools, and methodologies that can further optimize business processes and drive innovation.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges, identify root causes, and devise innovative, data-driven solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences and foster cross-functional cooperation.
- Proficiency in documenting business requirements using industry-standard techniques, such as user stories, use cases, and process flows, demonstrating a deep understanding of the business context and its operational needs.
- Proven expertise in configuring and maintaining complex enterprise-level systems, with a strong grasp of data mapping, integration, and troubleshooting methodologies.
- Demonstrated experience in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to drive process optimization, improve system efficiency, and deliver innovative capabilities.

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, which are commonly used in the development and maintenance of enterprise systems.
- Experience in working with Agile methodologies and a proven ability to adapt to changing business requirements.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, and a deep understanding of the industry's unique challenges and best practices.

Required Experience:
- Minimum 7 years of experience in a role that combines business and technical responsibilities, such as a business analyst, systems analyst, or configuration specialist.
- Proven track record of successfully translating complex business requirements into robust technical solutions and configurations that deliver measurable business value.
- Experience in collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement and support enterprise-level systems.

Preferred Experience:
- Hands-on experience in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence to optimize business processes and drive innovation within the vehicle configuration space.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and a demonstrated ability to lead the adoption of new technologies and best practices.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] for configuration management
- SQL and data visualization tools for data analysis and reporting
- Collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence) for requirement gathering and documentation
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms for process optimization and innovation

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative and dynamic work environment, with regular interaction with stakeholders from various departments and the opportunity to contribute to strategic decision-making.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a cross-functional team to deliver innovative, high-quality solutions that drive measurable business impact.
- Adaptability to changing business requirements and a commitment to continuous learning and process improvement, with a strong focus on exploring and implementing new technologies and methodologies.
- Dedication to thorough testing, comprehensive documentation, and knowledge sharing to ensure the long-term sustainability and scalability of implemented configurations.
